text: The Campbell's Company (renamed from Campbell Soup Company in November 2024 and doing business as Campbell's) is an American food company. It is best known for its canned soup products. It is headquartered in Camden, New Jersey. The company was started in 1869 by Joseph A. Campbell, a fruit merchant from Bridgeton, New Jersey, and Abraham Anderson, an icebox manufacturer from South Jersey. == References == == Other websites == * Category:American food companies Category:Companies based in New Jersey Category:1869 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in New Jersey
title: Campbell Soup Company
